title: Confusing error message when deposit is not made
body:
### Description

When deploying a validator with teku and mevboost and the deposit is not made, it shows a very confusing error message on validator side. Consensus side and mevboost are both OK and show correct error messages related to a deposit that isn't yet made. 

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)

Deploy a validator with mevboost and teku. (for EL I use Nethermind, but I assume this doesn't matter)

**Expected behavior:** Show an error message telling that the deposit is not yet made. Something like: 
`Failed to send validator registrations to Beacon Node | Deposit is not yet made`

**Actual behavior:** 
```
validator-client  | 2022-09-08 11:32:48.076 INFO  - 0 out of 1 validator(s) registrations were successfully sent to the Beacon Node.
validator-client  | 2022-09-08 11:32:48.077 ERROR - Validator   *** Failed to send validator registrations to Beacon Node
validator-client  | java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid params response from Beacon Node API (url = http://consensus:4000/eth/v1/validator/register_validator, status = 400, message = Status code 502 not supported)
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeThrowable(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniApply.tryFire(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeExceptionally(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateResult$3(SafeFuture.java:145) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenCompleteStage(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.whenComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:580) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:32) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.propagateResult(SafeFuture.java:142) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$exceptionallyCompose$30(SafeFuture.java:399) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniWhenComplete.tryFire(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]

validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenCompleteStage(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.whenComplete(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:580) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.whenComplete(SafeFuture.java:32) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]

validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
validator-client  | Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid params response from Beacon Node API (url = http://consensus:4000/eth/v1/validator/register_validator, status = 400, message = Status code 502 not supported)
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.ResponseHandler.defaultBadRequestHandler(ResponseHandler.java:129) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]

validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.handlers.RegisterValidatorsRequest.registerValidators(RegisterValidatorsRequest.java:52) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.typedef.OkHttpValidatorTypeDefClient.registerValidators(OkHttpValidatorTypeDefClient.java:101) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.lambda$registerValidators$30(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:443) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.lambda$sendRequest$31(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:449) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:81) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.sendRequest(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:460) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.RemoteValidatorApiHandler.lambda$sendRequest$32(RemoteValidatorApiHandler.java:455) ~[teku-validator-remote-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:73) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.9.0.jar:22.9.0]
validator-client  | ... 4 more
```

Mevboost shows the following error which is understandable (I've omitted my address): 

```
mev-boost  | time="2022-09-08T11:45:36Z" level=warning msg="error calling registerValidator on relay" error="HTTP error response: 400 / {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"not a known validator: 0x0\"}\n" method=registerValidator module=service numRegistrations=1 ua=okhttp/4.9.2 url="https://builder-relay-goerli.flashbots.net/eth/v1/builder/validators"
``` 

**Frequency:** every~5 minutes

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: Teku v22.9.0 with mevboost and nethermind
* Docker Version: 20.10.17
